title: if you want a 1v9 onetrick to carry in this meta you may or may not find bs, you should try talon
body:
been a talon onetrick since before rework, and he can easily carry you at atleast gold 1.been hard carrying all the low elo plebs putting my team in a backpack , sometimes even having to maximize my kit to kill multiple people by myself and take objectives the way only few champs can. my gameplay pattern is either kill laner before lvl 5 or go kill jg, and or hopping around using routes to completely avoid wards and come from behind right next to thier tower to kill bot and top, which ever looks more profitable and has higher chance of working, then i go bot again after 6 and a dirk or tiamat flower combo ignite adc get the double take first tower and drake and just kill everyone from there

was silver in season 7, then gold in season 8 and now in this season im climbing to plat at a rate of a division per day or 2

replies.body:
Yes it works
I loved Tiamat Talon and stealing enemy jg keeping them behind forever lol , it feels easy to be ahead on him
yeah might as well since your getting it regardless for the waveclear
